extension.summary: Infinity TV NEWS
extension.description: Receive Important Infinity TV Notifications. Unsubscribe within Add-on Settings.
extension.disclaimer: We take no responsibility for any problems this plugin might in any way, form, shape or size cause.

extension.summary: INFINITY TV Wizard for kodi
extension.description: Welcome to INFINITY TV

extension.summary: ShahidMBC.net XBMC Client
extension.description: Formally known as ShahidMBC.net. This plugin fetches the video sources from ShahidMBC.net, youtube and some Live channels which you can play on XBMC compatible plateforms

extension.summary: Showbox
extension.description: Watch Movies and TVShows on Showbox

extension.summary: Play videos of different sports streaming sites
extension.description: Play videos of different sports streaming sites

extension.summary: Video plugin for hockeystreams.com
extension.description: This Add-on allows access to hockeystreams.com streams, you will need a premium account at hockeystreams.com for this Add-on to function
extension.disclaimer: Some parts of this addon may not be legal in your country of residence - please check with your local laws before installing.

extension.summary: Maintenance Tool
extension.description: Maintenance Tool is your one stop tool for all fixes and information.

extension.summary: ZemTV.tv XBMC Client
extension.description: Watch ZemTV.com on your XBMC. This plugin fetches the video sources from ZemTV.com and play on XBMC compatible plateforms

extension.summary: totallatino
extension.description: agradecimientos a juarrox el creador de la base de este plugin y a largobarbate por su ayuda, sin la ayuda de ellos este addon no funcionaria
agradecimientos a juarrox el creador de la base de este plugin y a largobarbate por su ayuda, sin la ayuda de ellos este addon funcionaria

extension.disclaimer: Some parts of this addon may not be legal in your country of residence - please check with your local laws before installing.
Algunas partes de este addon podrían no ser legales en tu país de residencia - por favor comprueba las leyes de tu país antes de su instalación.

extension.description: Video plug-ins for XBMC

extension.description: INFINITY TV video plug-ins for Kodi

extension.summary: MX Repository
extension.description: Home of the MX add-ons on www.TVaddons.ag only.
extension.disclaimer: These add-ons can change at anytime so please stay updated. Support at www.tvaddons.ag ONLY

extension.summary: Addons related to XBMC for Zemtv etc
extension.description: Go though the plugins and see what you like

extension.summary: Install Hockey Streams XBMC Addons
extension.description: Download and install Hockey Streams addons by fungus1487, Swedemon

extension.summary: Python HTTP for Humans
extension.description: Packed for KODI from https://github.com/kennethreitz/requests

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.

extension.summary: Parental Controls
extension.description: A parental controls addon. Works only with sources that provide ratings such as HULU.

extension.description: Thanks to Fastcolors for SiO2. If you like Apple "everything at hand" policy for interfaces, You might want to give this Skin a try. I designed it trying to put as few clicks as possible between You and what You're trying to do (or watch ;) ).[CR]Thanks to Pecinko for Quartz as a solid base to build on.[CR] Thanks to testers and Inspirers: Toiva, Scrolling, Abrasher, Lucanoid, Relyter.

Se ti piace la politica di Apple per le interfacce grafiche "tutto a portata di mano", allora dovresti provare questa Skin. L'ho progettata cercando di mettere il minor numero di click tra te e quello che stai cercando di fare (o di guardare ;) ).[CR]Grazie a Pecinko per Quartz come solida base di partenza.[CR] Grazie ai testers e agli ispiratori:.. Toiva, Scrolling, Abrasher, Lucanoid, Relyter.

extension.summary: INFINITY TV skin
extension.description: INFINITY TV skin: Completely redesigned to create a modern look
